price: Warra kafaranii, karaa Rabbii irraa [namoota] deebisan [Rabbiin] hojiiwwan isaanii balleesseera.
arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ وَصَدُّواْ عَن سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ أَضَلَّ أَعۡمَٰلَهُمۡ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: alladhīna kafarū waṣaddū ʿan sabīli al-lahi aḍalla aʿmālahum
translations: He will cause to be lost
